post_title: SOLD: T206 Ty Cobb Red Piedmont 350 PSA 4
post_content:
FS - PSA 4 Ty Cobb Red Piedmont 350
SOLD - PPFF/PPGS+3%/Venmo/Zelle - Priority shipping included.
Message if interested
I upgraded, so time to say goodbye. Would consider trading for a centered Green or Bat Off Shoulder.
Wow! What a beauty & a good price.

Thanks man. I got a Polar Bear back else I love this one. It's priced to sell.
